Headline: #44 Wallace/Racine Temporary Reroute at Racine/67th
ShortDescription: 44 Wallace/Racine buses are temporarily rerouted via Racine, 63rd, Loomis, Marquette, and Racine due to, police activity near Racine/67th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#44 Wallace/Racine buses are temporarily rerouted via Racine, 63rd, Loomis, Marquette, and Racine due to, police activity near Racine/67th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No trains between Clark/Lake and Fullerton
ShortDescription: Brown Line service has been temporarily suspended between Clark/Lake and Fullerton due to a track condition.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line service has been temporarily suspended between Clark/Lake and Fullerton due to a track condition.

As a result, trains are operating only between Kimball and Fullerton at this time.

Shuttle buses will be available between Clark/Lake and Fullerton to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No trains between Howard and the Loop
ShortDescription: Purple Line Express service has been temporarily suspended between Howard and the Loop due to a track condition.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Purple Line Express service has been temporarily suspended between Howard and the Loop due to a track condition.

As a result, trains are operating only between Linden and Howard at this time.

Shuttle buses will be available shortly to provide connecting service through the affected area.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include the Red Line rail service.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
